City records are preserved in compliance with the Texas State Library and Archives Commission Records Retention Schedule.

### *complete the form below and email to jhugghins@hollywoodpark-tx.gov or fax to (210) 494-7859* .

[Public Information Request Form](https://hollywoodpark-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2025/12/ORR-form.pdf)
[For additional information on the Texas Public Information Act click on this link.](https://www.oag.state.tx.us/open/requestors.shtml)
[You can read the policy here](https://hollywoodpark-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/HP-Board-Application-Appointment-Process.pdf)

The Town of Hollywood Park is always accepting applications for boards.  If you are not sure what board to serve on, you can read a
[summarized description of each board](https://hollywoodpark-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Board-Descriptions.pdf)
.  Please follow the deadlines in the descriptions to submit your application in time for a regular term.  Anyone interested in serving, including incumbent board members,
must
complete an application and turn it in to the City Secretary’s office in person or via email, in order to be considered for a board position.

![](https://hollywoodpark-tx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2024/09/board-flowchart.jpg)
